preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 56.11 g of Potassium using a digital scale. 
 2. Weigh 54.94 g of Manganese. 
 3. Weigh 127.60 g of Selenium. 
 4. Weigh 28.09 g of Silicon. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all the weighed materials thoroughly using a spatula until homogeneous.
